title: Enhancing Business Strategy Practical Competencies: Collaborative Online Mathematics Learning Design Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: University-level foundational mathematics knowledge and online learning experience
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Participants can complete a draft of an online math module through a collaborative prototyping process within two weeks
Instructional designers and instructors can incorporate over 80% of content improvement suggestions by applying iterative feedback in an Agile approach
Participants can create interactive learning materials, including visual representations of mathematical concepts, using digital tools
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
